title: Russell Crowe Fightin’ Around the World
featuredTitle: Russell Crowe Fightin’ Around the World
description: Russell Crowe travels the world and finds some good fights.
quote: He loves to act but he loves one thing more: fightin’ round the world.
altHero: Russell Crowe angrily lifts up a director
alt1: Crowe pumps his fist at a man walking down a pier
alt2: Crowe is in China hiding behind a potted plant
alt3: Crowe wants to fight a group of dudes playing basketball
alt4: Crow poses in front of a sunset with a nearby wallaby and his boat “Tugger”
